Ghardaia Ouargla Oran Bejaia Blida Tamanrasset "Setif " Tlemcen Skikda Biskra Registration request Alarm On Alarm Off Sport 1 Sport 2 Sport 3 Sport 4 Sport 5 Sport 6 Sport 7 Sport 8 Sport 9 Sport 10 What is the definition of healthy nutrition ? Healthy nutrition refers to the consumption of a balanced and varied diet that provides the necessary nutrients for the body to function properly. A healthy diet typically includes a variety of foods from all the food groups, including fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats. It also involves limiting the intake of processed and high-calorie foods, sugary drinks, and alcohol.
